q: a radio talk show host, Mike Pence started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his`` no personal attacks'' pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995. The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman.
